name: HOMESTAY THIÊN CÂM
address: Thiên Cầm, Cẩm Xuyên, Việt Nam
description:
HOMESTAY THIÊN CÂM nằm ở Cẩm Xuyên và có khu vườn. Khách sạn 3 sao này có dịch vụ phòng và quầy lễ tân 24 giờ. Tại đây có sân hiên và khách có thể sử dụng Wi-Fi miễn phí và chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay quốc tế Vinh, cách khách sạn 80 km.

review.comment_positive: Ông chủ thân thiện, hiếu khách rất nhiệt tình vui vẻ!
review.comment_negative: Sự thân thiện, hiếu khách.

review.rating: Quá tuyệt vời, sẽ quay lại
review.comment_positive: Bạn lễ tân siêu nhiệt tình

review.rating: Nhân viên nhiệt tình, rất hài lòng, sẽ ghé lại và hy vọng sẽ được bơi trong hồ bơi sạch sẽ nhé
review.comment_positive: Khuôn viên và Phòng ốc quá sạch sẽ sang trọng, tôi rất thích
review.comment_negative: Hồ bơi bị đục nên vệ sinh thay nước thường xuyên để khách có thể sử dụng

review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ, tiện nghi, chị chủ nhiệt tình, rất đáng tiền.
OK
review.comment_negative: OK

review.comment_positive: It is a new building, walking distance from the beach. It is was a good drop by during our road trip.
review.comment_negative: The bathroom set up is uncomfortable.

review.comment_positive: This is probably the best place in terms of cleanliness we have stayed in. For us the location was perfect as we are cycling and so literally needed a place to stay and it was just off the main road junction - but still very quiet. It was only a 15 walk to the beach and they are doing loads of road building so it will soon be an amazing place to stop off on
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: The lady at reception was excellent. She went out of her way to ensure my stay was enjoyable.
review.comment_negative: Google maps isn't accurate. Took me to the rear entrance.

review.rating: 5-star facilities with 5-star treatment a well deserved rating of 10
review.comment_positive: The room, bathroom, swimming pool and the entire building is super clean and luxurious. Nothing short of 5-star quality! The beds, the bedding, the pillows and even the curtains are from super high quality material and very stylish. The owner, Mr Nguyen is an obvious  perfectionist with a lot of self pride. He treated us like royals and even spoiled us with a complimentary feast meal with him and his friends under the moonlight next to the sparkling clean swimming pool. Staying at his homestay was a momentous event.
review.comment_negative: Thien Cam is a little coastal town a few kms outside Ha Tinh with some nice hotels on the beach front. But unfortunately the beach itself is littered and it is for this very reason I rated the location of the homestay 10 as it is a few kms away from the beach (although walking distance) which is a better option in this town.

review.comment_positive: Heerlijk rustige homestay met zwembad en bewaakte parkeerplaatst voor (motor)fietsen. Gastvrije ontvangst. Goede warme douche en comfortabele bedden. Erg stille omgeving.
Ông chủ thân thiện, hiếu khách rất nhiệt tình vui vẻ!
review.comment_negative: Sự thân thiện, hiếu khách.

review.rating: Quá tuyệt vời, sẽ quay lại
